company_info.name: 100Gaj
company_info.headline: Find your Perfect Home with 100Gaj.
company_info.slogan: Your trusted partner in finding the perfect property that matches your dreams and aspirations.
company_info.description: We are a team of dedicated professionals committed to providing exceptional service and expertise in luxury real estate. We offer a range of services to help you find your dream home, from personalized consultations to virtual tours.

core_values.mission: To deliver exceptional real estate experiences by offering a curated selection of luxury properties and providing personalized, high-quality service to our clients.
core_values.vision: To be the premier choice for luxury real estate, setting new standards in the industry through innovation, integrity, and an unwavering commitment to client satisfaction.

leadership_team.name: Aryan Panda
leadership_team.title: CEO
leadership_team.bio: Aryan is a visionary leader driven by innovation and bold ambition. With fresh perspectives and unwavering dedication, he's shaping the future of 100Gaj from day one.

leadership_team.name: Bhoomi Singh
leadership_team.title: Chief Operating Officer
leadership_team.bio: As COO, Bhoomi brings energy and precision to operations, laying strong foundations for scalable growth. With a sharp focus on efficiency and execution, she is committed to turning strategy into lasting impact.

leadership_team.name: Shrishti Parihar
leadership_team.title: HR Manager
leadership_team.bio: Shrishti champions a people-first culture, building a supportive and inclusive environment. She is passionate about nurturing talent, fostering collaboration, and shaping a thriving workplace.

top_agents.name: Daksh Gupta
top_agents.title: Real Estate Agent
top_agents.bio: Experienced real estate agent specializing in Residential and Commercial properties.

trending_localities.description: A popular area with modern apartments and excellent connectivity to the city center and airport.
An upscale locality known for luxury high-rise apartments with world-class amenities and golf course views.
Delhi's most prestigious neighborhoods, featuring premium villas and bungalows.
A major corporate hub with modern residential complexes and well-developed urban infrastructure.

ai_tools.name: Virtual Property Tour
ai_tools.description: Explore properties from anywhere with AI-powered 3D walkthroughs, providing a realistic feel of the space without requiring physical visits.

ai_tools.name: Delhi Area Analyzer
ai_tools.description: An AI tool to analyze the pros, cons, safety, and infrastructure of different areas in Delhi, helping you make informed decisions about where to live or invest.

ai_tools.name: Price Prediction
ai_tools.description: Uses machine learning algorithms to predict property value trends based on specifications like area, bedrooms, and location.

ai_tools.name: Smart Home Integration
ai_tools.description: We feature and consult on properties with integrated AI systems to control lighting, security, and climate for a modern living experience.

ai_tools.name: Chatbot Assistant
ai_tools.description: A 24/7 AI-powered assistant, like me, built to answer your property queries instantly and provide detailed information.

ai_tools.name: Neighborhood Analysis
ai_tools.description: Our AI algorithms analyze crucial data points for any neighborhood, including safety scores, quality of amenities, and investment potential.

ai_tools.name: Document Analysis
ai_tools.description: Provides automated legal document review services, using AI to extract key terms and flag potential issues for faster and safer transactions.

buying_process.title: Search Properties
buying_process.description: Browse through thousands of our verified properties using advanced search filters that match your criteria.

buying_process.title: Schedule Visits
buying_process.description: Book property visits, both physical and virtual, with just a few clicks and tour your favorite properties at your convenience.

buying_process.title: Get Support
buying_process.description: Our team of real estate experts will guide you through the entire process, from property viewing and negotiation to documentation.

buying_process.title: Close the Deal
buying_process.description: Finalize your property transaction with confidence, backed by our professional legal and administrative support.

selling_process.title: Create Your Profile
selling_process.description: Sign up on our platform and complete your profile with your contact and verification details.

selling_process.title: List Your Property
selling_process.description: Provide detailed information about your property, including photos, amenities, location, and your asking price.

selling_process.title: Get Verified
selling_process.description: Our internal team reviews and verifies every new listing to ensure it meets our quality and accuracy standards.

selling_process.title: Connect with Buyers
selling_process.description: Once verified, your property is listed, and you will start receiving inquiries directly from our network of thousands of verified buyers.

why_choose_us.description: Every single property on our platform is physically verified by our team, ensuring that what you see is what you get. This guarantees accuracy and reliability.
Never miss an opportunity. You can set personalized price alerts for your preferred areas and get notified instantly about new listings or price changes.
Our team consists of seasoned real estate professionals. You can connect with them for unbiased guidance on buying, selling, or investing in properties.
We offer end-to-end legal support. Our team helps with all documentation, performs legal checks on properties, and ensures your paperwork is flawless.

premium_subscription.title: 100Gaj Premium
premium_subscription.description: Unlock exclusive features and get the most out of 100Gaj with our premium subscription.
features: Access to exclusive, off-market premium property listings.
Use powerful and advanced search filters to pinpoint your perfect property.
Receive 24/7 dedicated, priority customer support for all your queries.
